i dont like UOB ladies because of this :UNI$ expire 2 years from the last day of each periodic quarter in which the UNI$ was earned. Each UNI$ period is calculated commencing from January to December of each calendar year. Expired UNI$ cannot be replaced or reinstated.
What are you keeping UNI$ more than 2 years for?
before the end of the 2yrs expiry u can transfer into KF for an extra 3yrs expiry date  making it a total of 5yrs

I dunno your situation but need to be aware of what spending you do to make any meaningful return whether cashback or miles.With that said  it's a myth that one needs to have high spending to get something "good". The game is about being aware of spending and optimizing that spend.

cause currently for my case  i am spending on evol 600$ a monthany extra would be directed to my CRMC AMAZE. I rarely have any hotel / flight expenses. which CRMC amaze will cover my ass more   as i tend to eat out / buy stuff from shopee / lazada
cause i also thought of spending 25$ to transfer the miles over to my KF account  if the miles amount is too little. then spending 25$ to transfer that little amount of miles is not that worth it
yes i transfer mine over when it hits a minimum of 25kUNI$ only
i barely spend 1k a year in hotel / flights   so in my case not as worth it to get the uob ladies. i would rather go with a more generic card like hsbc revo
